body.class: mediawiki ltr ns-6 ns-subject page-File_Flag_of_Hungary_svg skin-vector

img.alt: File:Flag of Hungary.svg

div.p: Flag_of_Hungary.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,200 × 600 pixels, file size: 277 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

td.div: 日本語: ハンガリーの国旗

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

td.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; font-weight: bold

img.alt: Civil Ensign of Hungary.svg
Flag of Hungary.svg

td.a: official state flag for specific use

div.p: ► This is the flag of Hungary. The shape and size of the civil and the state flags are defined in a Hungarian executive decree "132/2000. (VII.14.) Korm. rendelet". Follow the links for flag variations.

► Magyarország zászlaja. A zászló használatának szabályairól törvény rendelkezik, a zászló méretét és alakját kormányrendelet határozza meg. Lásd még: Magyarország zászlaja. A különféle zászlóváltozatok eléréséhez kövesse a hivatkozásokat ("Other versions").

table.style: background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px solid #aaaaaa; border-collapse: collapse; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center; align:center
table.caption: unofficial recommendation for colors / nemhivatalos ajánlás a színekre

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 16:37, 11 April 2010
Thumbnail for version as of 09:09, 11 April 2010

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 10:16, 27 March 2010: CIA WOrld Factbook: https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/flags/flagtemplate_hu.html)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 09:41, 6 April 2010
Thumbnail for version as of 10:17, 27 March 2010
Thumbnail for version as of 10:16, 27 March 2010
Thumbnail for version as of 21:01, 8 August 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 15:35, 5 July 2009

td.span: (practiced conventions, including more or less what WikiProject Flags has used (Reverted to version as of 06:12, 5 July 2009))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 12:08, 5 July 2009

td.span: (Undone Read the discussion page. And don't touch our flags anymore.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:12, 5 July 2009

td.span: (these "of COUNTRY" file names are for state flags, and borders are not to be included (Reverted to version as of 08:52, 2 January 2009))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:47, 4 July 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 17:32, 6 June 2009

td.span: (The official ''civil'' flag's side ratio is 2:3. See the discussion page. / Lásd a "discussion" vitalapot.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 08:52, 2 January 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 15:19, 26 September 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 21:24, 25 September 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 12:44, 8 September 2006

td.span: (Sorry, previes version had a transparent middle instead of white.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 12:34, 8 September 2006

td.span: (This flag has now a correct green color.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:55, 28 September 2005

td.span: (The flag of Hungary. Source: Drawn by User:SKopp {{Template:Insignia}} Category:Flags of Hungary)
